templates.template:
#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by IPForward service (utility.py) sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.default.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=0 # setup forwarding for node interfaces sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.eth0.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.eth1.forwarding=1
#FIREWALL FILTRAGEM DE PACOTES NA BORDA sh /home/core/Desktop/controle/controle_borda.sh

#!/bin/sh # auto-generated by IPForward service (utility.py) sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.default.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=0 # setup forwarding for node interfaces sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth0.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.eth0.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.forwarding=1 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.send_redirects=0 sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.eth1.rp_filter=0 sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.eth1.forwarding=1
#ATIVAR O DHCRELAY dhcrelay -i eth1 -i eth0 172.16.5.4
#ATIVAR O DHCRELAY IPV6 dhcrelay -6 -l eth1 -u 2804:1f38:2001:600::4%eth0
#EXECUTAR O SCRIPT PARA LIBERAR IMPRESSORAS SOMENTE PRA PESSOAL AUTORIZADO sh /home/core/Desktop/controle/controle_impressoras.sh
